Buying Guide

The skin around your eyes is the thinnest on your face ‚Äî it's the first area to show aging, fatigue, and dehydration. A dedicated eye cream targets concerns regular moisturizers can't.

Quick Tips

  • üí° Caffeine is the #1 ingredient for depuffing ‚Äî look for it in morning eye creams
  • üí° Retinol eye creams should be gentler than face retinol (0.025-0.05%)
  • üí° Pat (don't rub) eye cream with your ring finger ‚Äî it applies the least pressure
  • üí° Dark circles can be genetic ‚Äî if creams don't help, vitamin C may brighten the area
